=== Summary ===
Template's list for translation, for each language on Rosetta, isn't sorted, filtered or grouped. Filtering it with only "need work" files may simplify the work of translators.

=== Rationale ===
The image below show the EDGY's PO List for translation.
 
<nowiki>[[File:TranslationsUpstreamGroupbyFilter/PO_List_It.jpg]]</nowiki>

With a click on Status we get a ordered list from only items showed on page.
